description: Multiple choice and short answer questions on Endocrine Physiology and Reproductive Physiology lecture/tutorial material
Two-part exam: Part 1 (35%) tests Respiratory, Kidney/Body Fluids and Gastrointestinal systems; Part 2 (25%) tests practical class content through MCQs
Five interactive tutorial modules with embedded quizzes requiring ≥90% score for credit. Covers major lecture topics
Four practical class revision modules with quizzes requiring ≥90% score for credit. Consolidates face-to-face lab work
